cause.description:
Show support for Bill A538-A Paulin (MS) Public Health Law TITLE....Prohibits smoking in dormitories, residence halls, and other group residential facilities
Bill has passed the NY State Assembly and is currently in the NY State Senate.
Contact your local State Senator and lobby your support <http://www.senate.state.ny.us/senatehomepage.nsf/home?openform>.
1. Secondhand smoke is a proven carcinogen.
2. Clean air is a universal right.
cause.mission: Clean the Air of Secondhand Smoke: Protecting the Health of New Yorkers
cause.name: I LOVE "SMOKE-FREE" NY
